index.title: Hi, Im Misha - Programmer, Engineer and Dreamer
index.description: I am a software engineer specializing in frontend and backend development for scalable web applications. With extensive experience in application development, testing, and managing both development teams and projects, I am focused on delivering high-quality and efficient solutions.

experience.title: My professional experience
experience.description: Over the past 19+ years, I have worked with a diverse range of clients, from government agencies to private companies, gaining extensive experience in software development.
